bean.name: ZipAggregationStrategy
bean.title: Zip Aggregation Strategy
bean.description: AggregationStrategy to zip together incoming messages into a zip file. Please note that this aggregation strategy requires eager completion check to work properly.

filePrefix.description: Sets the prefix that will be used when creating the ZIP filename.

fileSuffix.description: Sets the suffix that will be used when creating the ZIP filename.

allowEmptyFiles.label: advanced
allowEmptyFiles.description: Whether to add empty files to the ZIP.

preserveFolderStructure.label: advanced
preserveFolderStructure.description: If the incoming message is from a file, then the folder structure of said file can be preserved

useFilenameHeader.label: advanced
useFilenameHeader.description: Whether to use CamelFileName header for the filename instead of using unique message id

useTempFile.label: advanced
useTempFile.description: Whether to use temporary files for zip manipulations instead of memory.

parentDir.label: advanced
parentDir.description: Sets the parent directory to use for writing temporary files
